doc.name: StringMatches
doc.description: Pattern match a string to a regular expression and output a true if it matches and a false if it does not. For a reference on regular expression syntax see: http://download.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/regex/.
doc.author: Antonio Yordan-Nones, Colin Cochran, Contributor: Edward A. Lee
doc.port: Output is true if the pattern exists in the string, false otherwise. Its type is boolean.
doc.property: The string to be pattern matched to the regular expression.
The regular expression to be pattern matched with the matchString string. Its default parameter is an empty string that matches no strings.
